settings.text: Recover from long nights faster, restore your immune system, and energize with clean caffeine and cognitive enhancers. You accomplish all of the above with one serving of superfoods in Degen Daily Boost.

settings.title: BEETS
settings.text: Beets are arguably the most under consumed vegetable on earth. Beets are also one of the most nutrient dense foods on you'll find.

settings.title: ASTRAGALUS ROOT
settings.text: Astragalus root helps boost your immune system, protect your liver, aid cardiovascular and nervous systems, regulate blood sugars, and slow the growth of tumors.

settings.title: SHIITAKE
settings.text: Shiitake mushrooms have been found to contain immune-boosting minerals: potassium, calcium, magnesium, iron, copper, zinc, nickel, and manganese.

settings.title: LION'S MANE
settings.text: Lion's Mane is loaded with antioxidant, antimicrobial, and anti-cancer compounds. These compounds have shown to reduce anxiety and increase focus.

settings.title: SPIRULINA
settings.text: Spirulina contains 28 times more iron than raw beef liver and spinach, and 25 times more beta-carotene than carrots. Along with a wealth of antioxidants. Its time to work this into your daily routine.

settings.title: GREEN TEA CAFFEINE
settings.text: Green tea offers the greatest dietary source of a group of antioxidants known as "catechins". Seems like a worthy source of caffeine. It is better than your trash energy drink.

settings.heading: Win A Weekend in Las Vegas

settings.text: Each order placed on our website is an entry to a Las Vegas weekend getaway. Each order increases your chances at winning. This getaway includes round trip airfare for 2, and 2 nights in a 5 star resort on The Strip. Sign up for emails below to learn more. üòâ
